desc: Mounting your TV to a column, pillar or post has never been easier. Easily straps into place, No Drill, No Mess, No Guess. Reclaim your space. Great for condos, apartments, warehouses, gazebos and so much more!

layout.text: Safe, simple and easy-to-install solution for mounting a TV on a pillar, column or post. No Drill, No Mess, No Guess!
